comment:
REVIEW OUTCOME: REQUEST UPDATES

DEFICIENCY: Formatting inconsistency — em dash vs hyphen in "Performed By" columns.

TEMPLATE-VAR and SOP-004 Section 4.2 use em dashes (—) in the "Performed By" column. TEMPLATE-ADD uses hyphens (-). This creates an inconsistency across QMS templates.

Affected locations:
1. Section 5 EI table header: "Performed By - Date" → should be "Performed By — Date"
2. Section 5 EI table data rows (x2): "[PERFORMER] - [DATE]" → should be "[PERFORMER] — [DATE]"
3. Execution Comments table header: "Performed By - Date" → should be "Performed By — Date"
4. Execution Comments table data row: "[PERFORMER] - [DATE]" → should be "[PERFORMER] — [DATE]"

All other review criteria PASSED:
- Frontmatter: title="Addendum Report Template" (present, non-empty)
- Frontmatter: revision_summary="CR-082: Initial creation" (present, references CR)
- Template structure completeness: All sections present (1-8), sections align with executable document lifecycle
- Placeholder consistency: All authoring-time placeholders use {{DOUBLE_CURLY}}, all execution-time placeholders use [SQUARE_BRACKETS]
- Guidance comments: Clear, accurate, correctly marked "Do NOT delete"
- Locked vs editable boundary (Sections 1-4 locked, 5-7 editable): Documented correctly
- References: SOP-001, SOP-004 Section 9B (forward reference acceptable within CR-082 scope), parent doc placeholder
- No placeholder content (TBD, TODO, FIXME): None found
- No typographical errors found
- ADD vs VAR vs INV distinction: Clearly and accurately explained
- Structural parity with TEMPLATE-VAR: Confirmed

Please correct the five hyphen instances to em dashes for consistency, then re-route for review.

Re-review of TEMPLATE-ADD (v0.1) after em dash correction.

FRONTMATTER:
- title: "Addendum Report Template" -- present, non-empty
- revision_summary: "CR-082: Initial creation" -- present, descriptive

EM DASH FIX VERIFICATION (all 5 instances now use U+2014 em dash):
1. Line 144 - Execution table header: "Performed By — Date" -- PASS
2. Line 146 - EI-1 row: "[PERFORMER] — [DATE]" -- PASS
3. Line 147 - EI-2 row: "[PERFORMER] — [DATE]" -- PASS
4. Line 159 - Execution Comments header: "Performed By — Date" -- PASS
5. Line 161 - Comment row: "[PERFORMER] — [DATE]" -- PASS

DOCUMENT STRUCTURE: All 8 sections present and correctly numbered. Template notice and usage guide included as HTML comments. Locked vs editable guidance documented.

PLACEHOLDER CONTENT: No TBD/TODO/FIXME/XXX. Template placeholders (curly braces and square brackets) are intentional per usage guide.

FORMATTING: Consistent table formatting, section separators, and comment block style throughout.

CONTENT STANDARDS: No manually-inserted metadata per SOP-001 Section 5.4.

TYPOS/ERRORS: None found.

VERDICT: COMPLIANT. All deficiencies from previous review have been corrected. Recommend for approval.
